item.title: About
item.description:
About us

Maker Arts CIC is a community interest company based in the heart of Paignton, Torbay.

We offer small groups of students aged 9-16 bespoke courses in mindfulness, employability, art and science.

Our aims:

To develop confidence

Facilitate well-being

Encourage aspirations

We are particularly interested in supporting those that are anxious, phobic or otherwise disadvantaged.

Our end goal is to encourage these students back into the classrom.

Meet the team

Sue

Something about sue

item.title: Courses
Courses
item.description:
Courses

Arts Award

We offer three Arts Awards from Trinity College London. Arts Award inspires young people to grow their arts and leadership talents: it’s creative, valuable and accessible.

Qualifications

Discover: An introductory award aimed at young people under 25

Bronze: The Bronze Arts Award is a Level 1 qualification on the Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) and is open to young people aged 11 to 25.

Silver: The Silver Arts Award is a Level 2 qualification on the Regulated Qualifications Framework (RQF) and is designed for ages 14 and above, but is open to young people aged 11 to 25.

item.title: Privison
item.description:
Our Provisions


Employability Programme



The next steps into further education or careers can be daunting. Aimed at those in upper secondary school our bespoke employability programme encouraged young people to research job opportunities, try out ‘simulated work’ roles in our purpose build work environments and well as out in our community. In addition to CV writing, interview skills all delivered in a fun, engaging and creative way whilst working towards gaining qualifications.

item.title: What Is ARISE?
item.description:
ARISE means Artistic Recognition for Inpiring Success and Excellence

- we're talking about you!


We are so excited to join you in your screate journey and want to celebrate your wonderful work with the recognition you deserve.

ARISE is the flagship programme of Maker Arts CIC and is designed for creative people to experience and apply themselves to different projects and be rewarded for their efforts and help charitable causes.

Achievement award scheme

There are four challenges

  • Bronze - Identity
  • Silver - The Wonder of Nature
  • Gold - Connection
  • Platinum - It’s so Mystical!


    • You can complete just one, or all four challenges in a time frame that suits you. Create a piece of art, it can be a drawing, painting, made with clay, a sand drawing, pretty much anything that you find creative.


    Find the submission criteria and guidelines at the back of this book and upload your work, sit back and wait for your very special reward in the mail!
